def_en: You use mutual to describe a situation, feeling, or action that is experienced, felt, or done by both of two people mentioned.
You use mutual to describe something such as an interest which two or more people share.

def_cn: (指建屋互助会或保险公司)互助的，相互保险的
def_en: If a building society or an insurance company has mutual status, it is not owned by shareholders but by its customers, who receive a share of the profits.
